I know exactly where each of you fell.

Episode 26 Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 2
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Why did he take only five steps?
Why has not he moved any further?
That was a sneaky little plan.
Those were not footsteps at all.
It seems he just threw some ring-shaped objects.
This time, I definitely hear someone running.
Judging from the distance between footsteps, he is about 190...
These are a young man's footsteps.
The water's started chasing after Jotaro.
So that is what he is trying to do.
It will not attack Avdol again, but...
He is going to catch up to you!
I have heard that Jotaro's Stand,
Star Platinum, is the most challenging of their Stands.
If I can dispose of him, I am sure Lord Dio will be very pleased.
For Lord Dio, I will give my all to defeat Jotaro.
Jotaro picked up something from the ground just now.
No, it was not a thing.
You jumped out of the car before it got attacked, did not you?
You can tell where the enemy's coming from by the smell, cannot you?
You are going to help me out, Iggy.
Where is he going to attack?
You will not get any gum from me, either.
I may be heavy, but do not you dare try to escape alone.
My Star Platinum is incredibly fast.
If you try to shake me off, he will snap your neck in an instant.
The footsteps disappeared after the jump.
They have not landed anywhere yet.
Jotaro's going to travel through the air
and use Iggy to find the enemy's body.
If we can find the Stand user's body,
our chances of defeating that fearsome Stand are good.
The sound of Jotaro's footsteps has disappeared.
Looks like The Fool cannot fly very far.
So now it is just gliding, like a paper airplane?
My feet are about to scrape the ground.
Hey, do not strain so much.
Do not make us hit the ground.
I guess there is no choice.
I will have to help you gain height by kicking off the ground.
We regained quite a bit of speed from that,
but the sound of that impact put us at a major disadvantage.
He will know now that we are traveling through the air.
I must defeat Jotaro before he gets close!
That guy's Stand is chasing after Jotaro!
He must have figured it out from that step.
We have no choice but to entrust this fight
A helicopter is loud due to the vibrations,
but Iggy's Stand only makes sound as the wind hits it.
The enemy probably cannot figure out our exact location.
If I can get to the Stand user before I lose altitude, I can win!
I am about 400 meters away from his body!
It seems the enemy is a blind man.
He is spiraling sand into the air...
He can hear the sand bouncing off of us,
I even know how high you are...
No matter how fast Star Platinum may be,
if he cannot tell where I am coming from, I am still a second faster!
That dog is trying to save itself!
He pointed out Jotaro's location to my Stand.
He is trying to abandon him!
You have acquired such a selfish dog as an ally, Jotaro.
I will gratefully bring this to an end...
It is slicing through the wind...
If you and Iggy do not use your Stands to defend yourselves,
there is going to be a collision.
He is going to crash into me!
What kind of person is he?
I was one blast away from finishing Jotaro...
I could not verify Jotaro's location because I was too busy with the dog!
He is staying absolutely still somewhere.
Where the hell are you, Jotaro?
I did not realize you had gotten so close.
If I had not recalled my water Stand to defend me,
you would have already knocked me out from behind.
I guess I do not need to use this staff to help me listen anymore.
But I will need this staff to help me get home.
Even the ocean could not manage that.
You just used your own Stand to...
What the hell are you thinking?!
Jotaro, surely you considered interrogating me
about the other eight of us, who you are about to encounter.
anything that might leave my lord at a disadvantage.
Why are you all so loyal to Dio?
So loyal that you would die...
Jotaro, I have no fear of death.
I have not known fear of death since I was a child.
and could commit murders and other crimes as I pleased.
The police did not scare me at all.
I am sure that dog understands how I felt.
He was the first and only person to make me feel from the bottom of my heart
that I did not wish to die by his hand.
He was so powerful, deep, large, and beautiful.
And he was the first in this world to acknowledge my worth.
I waited so long to meet him.
I have no fear of death, but...
I feared that he might cast me aside and kill me.
The evil need an evil savior.
I will tell you one thing.
My Stand represents what could be called the Tarot's origin.
It suggests the deity Geb, one of the nine Egyptian gods.
He is god of the Earth.
I am only going to tell you about my Stand...
Since it was my Stand that you defeated.
But that is all I will say...
Dio, who makes fanatics out of people...
And those who suggest the nine Egyptian gods...?
I do not know what is going on,
but all we can do is continue our journey.
I am not mad or anything.
the old man dragged you out into a desert against your will,
and forced you into a fight.
That had to be a real pain in the ass.
I am apologizing, are not I?
You are in the middle of the desert.
You picked up my hat for me?
Maybe you are not so bad.
So there is manga in Egypt, too?
I might be asking too much,
but could I take a look at that manga?
I am a manga artist out on a research trip,
and I am very interested in rare manga and books.
In exchange, I will let you use these binoculars.
The title is Zenyatta Mondatta Brothers Adventure.
It is well-printed, and in full color!
In a certain place, there lived two very close brothers.
The younger brother, Mondatta, was very shy,
so he could not do anything without his big brother Zenyatta.
While his big brother, Zenyatta, was out,
Mondatta met a traveler who was very kind to him.
The traveler gave him snacks and let him look through his binoculars.
Mondatta had a very good time.
impaled his throat on an electrical pole and died.
Is stuff like this popular in Egypt?
And this book itself is pretty weird.
The pages from here on are all blank.
But it is an oddly realistic and thrilling manga.
I know I may be asking too much, but would you please sell me this book?
My little brother's book is not for sale!
Get the hell out of here.
Little bro, I told you not to talk to strangers.
There are a lot of bad people in this world.
The bus for Aswan is about to depart!
a hospital in Aswan to treat their wounded.
I guess we cannot do much about that.
We will have to wait for the next bus.
Jotaro, what happened to your uniform?
